description: The twin sister of the Western Maiden. She is a school sports star. When Head takes a leave from the organization, Marino, under the name Manticore, is promoted to head of the Vanishing Age. She is devoted to keeping the fact that her sister Mizuno is the West Maiden; it is implied that this is her reason for joining the Glittering Crux. The You sisters grew up without parents as their father left them and her mother went after him leaving Marino and Mizuno alone. Because he left them, Marino has always resented her father because of what he did. She apparantly has feelings for Takuto like her sister. She is the driver of Ayingott.
name: You Marino
